Pawtucket.Sandra Feinstein-Gamm Theatre:
The Sandra Feinstein-Gamm Theatre (aka The Gamm) is a non-profit theater in Pawtucket, Rhode Island. It is housed in the Pawtucket Armory Center for the Arts.


== History ==
The theatre was founded in October 1984 as Alias Stage by seven members of the graduating class of Trinity Rep Conservatory.
